oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Crystal Gayle Live at the Morris Stage - 1978-08-03
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: The recording is from Crystal Gayle's (musician) live performance at the Morris Stage in New Jersey. The performance was on August 03, 1978. The tape was created by the WHN radio network.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Crystal Gayle
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) The crowd cheers Lee Arnold who introduces Crystal Gayle -- (01:04) Unidentified instrumental tune ([Unidentified]) -- (04:16) Well There She Goes ([Unidentified]) -- (08:04) Wounded Love [Unconfirmed] ([Unidentified]) -- (10:51) All My Tomorrows (Crystal Gayle) -- (14:48) Half the Way (Crystal Gayle) -- (17:30) Gayle addresses the crowd and her new album -- (18:24) Someday Soon (Crystal Gayle) -- (22:26) You'll Never Miss a Real Good Thing ('Til He Says Goodbye) (Crystal Gayle) -- (26:10) Green Door (Crystal Gayle) -- (29:14) Wrong Road Again (Crystal Gayle) -- (33:46) I'll Get Over You (Crystal Gayle) -- (37:33) Ready For the Times to Get Better (Crystal Gayle) -- (41:13) Talking in Your Sleep (Crystal Gayle) -- (44:52) Gayle addresses her lighting engineer -- (45:14) Cry Me a River (Crystal Gayle) -- (48:51) Why Have You Left the One You Left Me For (Crystal Gayle) -- (52:02) Gayle introduces her band to the audience -- (54:06) A Woman's Heart (Is a Handy Place to be) (Crystal Gayle) -- (57:33) Sweet Baby on My Mind (Crystal Gayle) -- (1:00:52) Don't It Make My Brown Eyes Blue (Crystal Gayle) -- (1:04:36) Gayle asks for assistance on the next song -- (1:04:51) One More Time (Crystal Gayle) -- (1:09:52) Arnold addresses the crowd and praises Gayle
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Gayle, Crystal; Arnold, Lee (Disc jockey);
